member.name: T:Fractarium.Logic.BaseParameters
member.summary: Holds the basic parameters needed to generate a fractal image.

member.name: P:Fractarium.Logic.BaseParameters.Width
member.summary: Width of the fractal image.

member.name: P:Fractarium.Logic.BaseParameters.Height
member.summary: Height of the fractal image.

member.name: P:Fractarium.Logic.BaseParameters.IterationLimit
member.summary: Maximum amount of iterations possible for determining a pixel.

member.name: P:Fractarium.Logic.BaseParameters.ZoomFactor
member.summary: How much the scale is multiplied after clicking on a point in the image.

member.name: P:Fractarium.Logic.BaseParameters.Scale
member.summary: How far the image is zoomed in.

member.name: P:Fractarium.Logic.BaseParameters.Midpoint
member.summary: Central point of the image.

member.name: T:Fractarium.Logic.ComplexUtil
member.summary: Utilities for handling complex numbers.

member.name: M:Fractarium.Logic.ComplexUtil.TryParse(System.String,System.Numerics.Complex@)
member.summary: Tries to convert the string representation of a number to its complex number equivalent.
member.param: String representing a complex number.
A complex number parsed from the string or zero if parsing failed.
member.returns: Whether the conversion succeeded or failed.

member.name: M:Fractarium.Logic.ComplexUtil.ParseReal(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the real part of a string representing a complex number.
member.param: String representing a complex number.
member.returns: The real part of the complex number.

member.name: M:Fractarium.Logic.ComplexUtil.ParseImaginary(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the imaginary part of a string representing a complex number.
member.param: String representing a complex number.
member.returns: The imaginary part of the complex number.

member.name: M:Fractarium.Logic.ComplexUtil.ToString(System.Numerics.Complex)
member.summary: Generates a concise string representation of a complex number.
member.param: The complex input.

member.summary: Represents a fractal image based on the Burning Ship Julia set.

member.summary: Assigns all required parameters.

The Julia constant parameter.

member.name: M:Fractarium.Logic.Fractals.BurningShipJuliaSet.IteratePoint(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double@,System.Double@)
member.summary: Iterates a complex point according to a specific fractal type's formula.
member.param: Real component of the complex point to be iterated.
Imaginary component of the complex point to be iterated.
Real component of the next complex number after break condition was reached.
Imaginary component of the next complex number after break condition was reached.
member.returns: How many iterations were cycled through.

member.name: T:Fractarium.Logic.Fractals.Fractal
member.summary: Base class for all fractals based on escape time algorithms.

member.name: F:Fractarium.Logic.Fractals.Fractal.DivergenceLimit
member.summary: For most fractals, when the sum of squares of a complex point's components after iteration surpasses 4, it is considered to be divergent.

member.summary: Basic parameters needed to generate a fractal image.

member.summary: Draws the image of the fractal starting on a 32-bit unsigned integer pointer.

member.name: M:Fractarium.UserInterface.ParameterTab.DisableRenderIfInvalidInput
